# invalidate()

**Instance Method**

Stops any outstanding operations and invalidates the manager.

## Declaration

```swift
func invalidate()
```

## Discussion



Once you call this method, the object can no longer be used. To start using [doc://com.apple.exposurenotification/documentation/ExposureNotification/ENManager] again, create and activate a new instance of the class.

## Completion Handlers

- **invalidationHandler**: The handler that the framework invokes when invalidation completes.

items.description: The handler that the framework invokes when invalidation completes.
